item.description:
Is there any connection with the spiritual storylines of these Hollywood movies and the Buddhist teachings? What is the connection between the Force and the Mother Tree with Amida Buddha and the Primal Vow? What about the Shaolin monks and the Jedis? More connections and implications will be explored in this multi-media presentation. This will be a continuation of Eli Williamson-Jones' dharma discussion in 2005. Presented by Eli Williamson-Jones.

See our CALENDAR @

www.bffct.net

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: Middletown Buddhist Meetup - Star Wars, Avatar and Buddhism
